headline: Bolton, in Twist,  Offers To Testify  At Trump’s Trial
abstract: The former national security adviser, who has complied with a White House directive not to cooperate in the inquiry, said he would testify if the Senate subpoenaed him.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — John R. Bolton, the former White House national security adviser, said on Monday that he was willing to testify at President Trump’s impeachment trial, putting new pressure on Republicans to call witnesses and raising the possibility of revelations as the Senate weighs Mr. Trump’s removal.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
